ai-tha-ap320:1.2_0: like a fire on a mountain-top.
ai-tha-ap320:1.4_0: to the top of the mountains:
ai-tha-ap320:2.2_0: So too the moon and sun
ai-tha-ap320:3.2_0: the Buddha is the best of disciples,
ai-tha-ap320:3.4_0: I saw the benefit of the world
ai-tha-ap320:5.1_0: Taking the inside of the body,
ai-tha-ap320:5.4_0: I’ll rejoice in heaven for an eon.’
ai-tha-ap320:6.1_0: if he makes his four eons;
ai-tha-ap320:6.2_0: What was said by the Buddha,
ai-tha-ap320:6.3_0: I’m not aware of any living creatures.
ai-tha-ap320:6.4_0: this fruit is the fruit of deed.
ai-tha-ap320:7.1_0: In a single stricken by one eons
ai-tha-ap320:9.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Tissa.
